panama.filter
Class ExpressionFilter

java.lang.Object
  panama.filter.Filter
      panama.filter.ExpressionFilter

public class ExpressionFilter
extends Filter

A Filter encapsulating a Ebean Expression. Only for use with QueryistModels. The Expression is passed to the Constructor and can be arbitrarily complex.

Author:
ridcully

Method Detail

asExpression

public com.avaje.ebean.Expression asExpression(com.avaje.ebean.Query<?> query,
                                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,FilterExtension> filterExtensions)
Description copied from class: Filter
Creates representation of the Filter for use with Ebean Expression model. The method in this base class simply returns an 'always true' expression, classes extending this class will return more useful values.

Overrides:
asExpression in class Filter
filterExtensions - A Map with optional stuff for special filter treatments
Returns:
an Expression representing the Filter.
